data.text: Nan adarasi, ia kamaghɨn foghasa kɨ ifonge. Mosesɨn dughiamɨn, en ovaviba bar ghuariar God tuavimɨn men akakazimɨn apengan iti. Ezɨ me bar deravɨra Ongarir Aghevim abigha ghue.
Egha me bar ghuariam ko ongarimɨn rurim ini, ezɨ rurir kam me gamizɨma, me Mosesɨn gɨn aruir gumazamizibar otifi.
10:3 Ua Me Ini 16:35; Nehemia 9:15; 9:20; Onger Akaba 78:24Egha me bar moghɨra dagher God me ganɨngiziba ame.

10:4 Onger Akaba 78:15Egha me bar moghɨra dɨpar God me ganɨngiziba ame. God dagɨar me ko aruim gamizɨma, dɨpam an ikegha otivaghirima, me aneme. Ezɨ dagɨar kam, a Krais uabɨ.10:4 Akɨnafarir Mosesɨn ingangarimɨn gun mɨgeiba, da mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir pumuning iti, aning Israelia dɨpam dagɨamɨn a inizir arazim geghari. Mam, Ua Me Ini 17:1-7ɨn iti, ezɨ mam Dɨboboniba 21:1-13ɨn iti. Judabar marazi ghaze, mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kamning dagɨar vamɨram eghari. Dagɨar kam Israelian gɨn danganir me aruiba bar dagh arui.

10:5 Dɨboboniba 14:16; 14:29-30; Onger Akaba 106:26; Hibru 3:17; Jut 1:5Ezɨ God gumazamizir kabar avɨriba, men arazibagh ifongezir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn, God me mɨsuagharigha, men kuaba tintinimɨn danganir dɨpaba puvatɨzimɨn pura da kavamangi.
Ezɨ arazir me amizir kaba, da mati ababaniba, e dar ganigh ua men mɨn bizir kuraba bagh naviba dɨkavan kogham.

10:7 Ua Me Ini 32:6; 1 Korin 10:14Mati me marazi amizɨ moghɨn, ia marvir guabar ziaba fan markɨ. Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Me apiagha dagheba ko dɨpaba amegha, gɨn dɨkavigha ghua ighiar kurabagh ami.”

10:8 Dɨboboniba 25:1-18; Onger Akaba 106:29; Akar Mogomem 2:14Mati men marazi amizɨ moghɨn, e gumazamiziba uari bakɨava akuir arazim damuan kogham. Ia fo, dughiar vamɨran, men 23,000pla gumazamiziba ariaghire.
10:9 Ua Me Ini 17:2; 17:7; Dɨboboniba 21:5-6; Godɨn Araziba 6:16Mati men marazi amizɨ, kuruzir kuraba me givima me ariaghirezɨ moghɨn, e Krais bizitam damusɨ a gakaghonan kogham.
10:10 Ua Me Ini 16:2; Dɨboboniba 14:2; 14:29; 14:37; 16:41-49; 1 Eghaghaniba 21:15; Hibru 3:11; 3:17Mati men marazi amizɨ, Ovevemɨn Ensel iza me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ moghɨn, Ia God gimoman markɨ.

Bizir me batozir kabanang, da mati ababaniba, eghtɨ gumazir igharaziba dar ganam. God kamaghɨn ifonge, da nɨghnɨzim e datɨrɨghɨn itir gumazamizibar anightɨ, e deraghvɨra uari bagh ganam. Kamaghɨn, gumazamiziba fomɨra eghaghanir kaba Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn e bagha da osiri. Dughiar e itir kam, kar nguazim gɨvamim dughiar abuananam.
Kamaghɨn, gumazitam o amizitam suam, kɨ tugha gavgafi, a deragh gan, egh iran markɨ.

10:13 Jeremaia 29:11; 1 Korin 1:9; 2 Pita 2:9Osɨmtɨzir ia bativiba, da osɨmtɨzir kabanangɨra, gumazamiziba bar me batifi. Ezɨ God uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn ghua, osɨmtɨzir ian gavgavibagh afirazɨ tam ateghtɨ, a ia batoghan kogham. Osɨmtɨziba ia bativtɨ, God ian akuraghsɨ tuavim damigham. Tuavir kam kamakɨn: a ia damightɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigham, eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir kam ia abɨraghan kogham.
Kamaghɨn, nan namakaba, ia marvir guabar ziaba fer arazimɨn saghon ikɨ.
Ia fofoziba iti, kamaghɨn kɨ ia mɨgei. Ia uari nan akaba tuisɨgh.

10:16 Matyu 26:26-28; Mak 14:22-24; Luk 22:19-20; Aposel 2:42; 2:46Kavɨn kam Godɨn bizir aghuiba an itima, e a bagha God mɨnabi. E an wainɨn dɨpam apir dughiamɨn an e gamima, e bar moghɨra uari inigha Kraisɨn ghuzimɨn posi. Ezɨ bretɨn e bɨzir kam, e anepir dughiamɨn, an e gamima, e bar moghɨra uari inigha Kraisɨn inivafɨzimɨn posi.
10:17 Rom 12:5; 1 Korin 12:27; Efesus 4:16Bretɨn rubuzir vamɨra iti, ezɨ e bar moghɨra uari inigha bretɨn rubuzir kamnaghɨram apa, kamaghɨn e gumazamizir avɨriba, e inivafɨzir vamɨra iti.
Ia Israelian arazim gɨnɨghnɨgh. Me ofa gamir dakozim gisɨn tuezir asɨziba apir dughiamɨn, me uari inigha ofa God ganɨdi.10:18 Grighɨn akamɨn, vezɨn kam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨam a bɨghizir puvatɨ.

Kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgeir puvatɨ, asɨzir me isa ofan mɨn marvir guabagh anɨdiba, da bizir ekiam, o marvir guaba da bizir ekiaba. Puvatɨ, da pura biziba. Guizbangɨra, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨgei, Godɨn ziam fer puvatɨzir darazi ofa gamir biziba, me da isa asebagh anɨdi. Me God bagha ofa gamir puvatɨ. Egh ia uari inigh aseba ko poghan, kɨ aghua.
10:21 Godɨn Araziba 32:38; 2 Korin 6:15-16Ia Ekiamɨn kap ko asebar kap vɨraram aningɨn daman markɨ. Egh ia Ekiamɨn dagher dakozim ko asebar dagher dakozim vɨraram aningɨn daman markɨ.
E ti Ekiam damightɨ, an navim ikuvigham o? En gavgavim ekevegha, Ekiamɨn gavgavim gafiras? Bar puvatɨ!

Marazi ghaze, “God en amamangarɨgha ghaze, e biziba bar dar amuam.” Ezɨ e amir bizir maba deravɨra en akurvazir puvatɨ. Marazi ghaze, “God en amamangarɨgha ghaze, e biziba bar dar amuam.” Ezɨ e amir bizir maba, e Kraisɨn adarasi, da gavgavim e ganɨdir puvatɨ.
10:24 Rom 15:1-2; 1 Korin 13:5; Filipai 2:4; 2:21E uarira uarir akurvaghsɨ, nɨghnɨghan kogham. Puvatɨ, e igharaz darazir akurvaghsɨ nɨghnɨgham.

Asɨzir me maketɨn amadiba, ia dar amɨ. Egh navir averiamɨn nɨghnɨzir avɨribar amu, tintinimɨn azangsɨghan markɨ suam, a dera o a ikufi. Puvatɨ.10:25 Dughiar mabar me asɨziba marvir guabar ofa gamua, egha gɨn da isa ghua maketɨn da amadi. Ezɨ Pol kamaghɨn mɨgei, Kraisɨn adarazi maketɨn ivezir asɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh osɨman markɨ, egh suam, me dar amegh, paza damigham. Puvatɨ. Me dar amam.
10:26 Ua Me Ini 19:5; Godɨn Araziba 10:14; Onger Akaba 24:1E fo, Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, “Nguazir kam ko an itir biziba bar, da bar moghɨra Ekiamɨn biziba.”

Eghtɨ gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn itir puvatɨzitaba, ia ko damɨsɨ ia mɨkɨmtɨ, ia ifongegh, me ko mangɨ. Dagher manam me ia danightɨ, ia pura aneremɨ. Nɨ navir averiamɨn nɨghnɨzir avɨribar amu, pura tintinimɨn azangsɨghan markɨ suam, dagher kam deras, o a ikufi.
10:28 1 Korin 8:7Eghtɨ tav ia mɨkɨm suam, “Dagher kaba, me da isa, marvir guabar ofa gami.” Eghtɨ ia gumazim o amizir ia mɨkemezim bagh nɨghnigh, daman markɨ. Ia pazɨ damuan markɨ.
10:29 Rom 14:16Ia paza uarir amuasa, kɨ ia mɨgeir puvatɨ. Kɨ gumazir igharazir kamɨn mɨgei, a ua suam, ia pazav ami.
10:30 Rom 14:6; 1 Timoti 4:3-4Kɨ God mɨnabagh damɨtɨ, gumazamizir igharaziba tizim bagh mɨgɨrɨgɨar kurabar nan dagher kɨ God mɨnabazir kabav kɨmam?
Kamaghɨn, ia dagheba api, o ia dɨpaba api, o ia bizir igharazibagh ami, ia ziar ekiam God danɨngɨsɨ, bizir kaba bar dar amu.
10:32 Rom 14:13; 1 Korin 8:13; 2 Korin 6:3; 1 Timoti 3:5Ia Judaba ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba ko Kraisɨn adarazigh nɨghnɨghɨva, egh me damutɨ, me arazir kuramɨn iran markɨ.

10:33 Rom 15:2; 1 Korin 9:20-22; 10:24Egh kɨ amir arazibara, ia dar gɨn mangɨ. Kɨ kamagh sua, God gumazamiziba bar men akurvaghasa. Kamaghɨn, kɨ amir araziba bar, me damightɨ, me dagh ifuegham. Kɨ uabɨ uabɨn akurvaghasa amir puvatɨ, kɨ gumazamizir igharazibar akurvaghasava ami.
